A viral message on social media claims that WikiLeaks has released a list of top black money holders in Swiss banks. Incidentally, all the individuals named in the list are Indians. “Undigestible news: Indians black money in Swiss bank is Rs. 358,679,863,300,000 (estimated to be 1.3 trillion dollars) this money belongs to 2000 indians who have kept there to evade from tax, This money is enough for our india to become 10 america and become one of the most powerful developed country in the world for next 100yrs..Please raise your hand by forwarding this to all if you have free messages..As an INDIAN I am Forwarding…” reads the concluding para of the message.
WIKI LEAKS Published 1st List of black money holders in SWISS bank…… The Top Most 30 members are…..(money is in…
Posted by Sampath Sarangapani on Tuesday, 10 September 2019

Karnataka Congress minister KJ George tops the list with an alleged net worth of Rs 5.82 lakh crores, followed by AIMIM President Asaduddin Owaisi (Rs 5.687 lakh crores), SP President Akhilesh Yadav (Rs 3 lakh crores) and West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee (Rs 2.57 lakh crores). Other prominent names that appear on the list (which is not in chronological order) are Sonia Gandhi, Pranab Mukherjee, Chidambaram, DK Shivakumar, Siddaramaiah, Ahmad Patel, Manmohan Singh, Mayawati and Rahul Gandhi among others. The list has 30 names.

Alt News found that the same message – ‘WikiLeaks published 1st list of black money holders in Swiss bank’ – has been doing rounds online at least since 2011. The earliest instance we found on Facebook listed 13 individuals, including former Prime Minister Rajeev Gandhi who was assassinated in 1991.
WIKI LEAKS Published 1st List of black money holders in SWISS bank…… The Top Most 13 members are…..(money is in…
Posted by Rakesh Kumar Sharma on Thursday, 22 September 2011
The list went through a makeover in 2014 when 24 persons were named. Rajeev Gandhi made a comeback among several other individuals who adorn the recent list.
The 2016 and 2017 lists featured Prime Minister Modi.
WIKI LEAKS Published 1st List of black money holders in SWISS bank…… The Top Most 24 members are…..(money is in…
Posted by टीम श्रुती चौधरी on Monday, 26 December 2016
The list currently viral has been circulating since last year. A similar pattern was also observed on Twitter.

WikiLeaks has not come up with a recent list of Indians who are the top black money holders in Swiss bank. The last report published by the organisation was in January 2019 and it was on the Catholic Church.
A list on top Indian black money holders has, in fact, never been released by Wikileaks. A keyword search on the website makes this evident.
In 2011, Wikileaks had tweeted a clarification on fake lists on Indian black money being shared on social media.
WARNING: WikiLeaks and Indian black money: The following is a FAKE image and never appeared on WikiLeaks http://t.co/Dwbpc3P
— WikiLeaks (@wikileaks) August 5, 2011
Wikileaks’s name is being used to give credence to a piece of misinformation that reappears every year in different versions.
